name: Beginner
description:
It's time to earn some badges!

Hundreds of the best games on Kongregate contain tasks that award badges when completed -- visible to anyone from your profile. Below is a list of some great games to get you started, hand-picked by the Kongregate staff for being simple to play and lots of fun. Earn every badge below to unlock the Graduation Medal and earn 30 bonus points!

name: Best of 2007
description: Relive the first magical year on Kongregate with a look back all the way to 2007 (and technically late 2006) with the top 10 games of the year! Earn the designated badge in each game to earn 50 bonus points.

name: Best of 2008
description: SEQUELS! 2008 had plenty of them. Complete each designated badge in the top 10 games of 2008 to earn 50 bonus points!

name: Best of 2009
description: Complete some badges from the top 10 games of 2009 to earn 50 bonus points!

name: Best of 2010
description: Complete some badges from the top 10 games of 2010 to earn 50 bonus points!

name: Pixel Pack
description: Back in my day, we didn't have these fancy vector graphics or 3D polygonism hoopla! Celebrate the pixelated past in each badge below to earn 50 bonus points!
